name: Western Genre
description: Frontier and cowboy themes with rugged landscapes, Old West atmosphere, and frontier justice

prompt.base: Western frontier style, rugged landscapes, Old West atmosphere, dusty towns, cowboy aesthetic, desert vistas, frontier justice, weathered textures, golden hour lighting, wide open spaces
prompt.positive: desert landscapes, cowboy hats, weathered leather, dusty atmosphere, saloon interiors, frontier towns, rugged terrain, golden sunset, wide horizons, western architecture, horse riding, gunslinger poses, rustic textures
prompt.negative: modern elements, urban settings, contemporary fashion, technology, lush vegetation, tropical environments, futuristic elements, clean pristine surfaces

technical.color_palette: Warm earth tones, dusty oranges, desert colors
technical.lighting: Harsh sunlight, dramatic golden hour, high contrast
technical.composition: Wide landscape shots, silhouettes, frontier framing

variations.name: Classic Western
variations.modifier: traditional cowboys, frontier towns, saloons, dusty streets, classic western iconography

variations.name: Spaghetti Western
variations.modifier: stylized violence, extreme close-ups, operatic drama, stark landscapes, iconic silhouettes

variations.name: Revisionist Western
variations.modifier: gritty realism, moral ambiguity, harsh conditions, authentic period details, darker tone

examples: A lone cowboy silhouetted against a dramatic sunset, vast desert landscape, dusty atmosphere, classic western composition
An Old West saloon interior, warm oil lamp lighting, weathered wood textures, frontier atmosphere, rustic details
